cause.description:
Relay For Life is the American Cancer Society's signature event. Relay represents the hope that those lost to cancer will never be forgotten, that those who face cancer will be supported, and that one day, cancer will be eliminated.
This is a walk for a cure. Every dollar raised is money used in research, education, service, and advocacy in order to find a cure for cancer and to support services for cancer victims.
American Cancer Society Mission Statement:
The American Cancer Society is the nationwide community-based voluntary health organization dedicated to eliminating cancer as a major health problem by preventing cancer, saving lives, and diminishing suffering from cancer, through research, education, advocacy, and service.
1. The hope that those lost to cancer will never be forgotten
2. The hope that those who face cancer will be supported
3. The hope that one day, cancer will be eliminated.
